body:
# State of the Repo Report, December 2018

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics Ã¢ÂÂ enjoy! Ã°ÂÂ¤Â

The "median open pull request" adds 39 lines, removes 13 lines and touches 3 files.

The total set of open pull requests adds 42085 lines, removes 13358 lines and touches 1443 distinct files.
